| Overview                = The '''Warriors of the Deadly Hammer''' are the foot soldiers representing the [[House of the Deadly Hammer]], one of the five Houses of the [[Five Weapons Society (Earth-616)|Five Weapons Society]].  As an homage to the namesake [[Deadly Warriors (Earth-616)|Deadly Warrior]], the Warriors of the Deadly Hammer are dressed in yellow and utilize heavy war hammers and maces.  
| History                 = After [[Zheng Shi-Hua (Earth-616)|Sister Hammer]] usurped control of the Society from [[Brother Staff (Earth-616)|Brother Staff]], the Warriors of her House pledge their loyalty to her, despite [[Zheng Zu (Earth-616)|Zheng Zu]]'s [[Ghosts|spirit]] naming [[Shang-Chi (Earth-616)|Shang-Chi]] as the rightful ruler of the Society.{{r|Shang-Chi Vol 1 1}}  After Sister Hammer is ousted from the Society and Shang-Chi is named the new Supreme Commander, the Warriors of the Deadly Hammer swear fealty to him.{{r|Shang-Chi Vol 1 5}}
